thing-type.label: Alarm system
thing-type.description: A logical thing describing general status of the alarm system.

channel.label: Date and time
channel.description: Current date and time in the alarm system

channel.label: Troubles
channel.description: Active when the system has troubles (trouble led is blinking on a panel)

channel.label: Service mode
channel.description: Active when the system is in service mode

channel.label: ACU-100 present
channel.description: Active when there is an ACU-100 module installed in the system

channel.label: INT-RX present
channel.description: Active when there is an INT-RX module installed in the system

channel.label: Grade2/Grade3 set
channel.description: Active when Grade2/Grade3 option is set in the system

channel.label: User code
channel.description: Accepts string commands that override configured user code. Send empty string to revert user code to the one in the configuration.
